exceptions.exn: In environment A1 : Type A2 : Type B1 : Type B2 : Type x1 : A1 x2 : A2 y1 : B1 y2 : B2 R : A1 * B1 -> A2 * B2 -> Prop y : ?M1621 (?M1617, ?M1619) (?M1618, ?M1620) Unable to unify "?M1621 !! (fst, fst)%rel ?M1617 ?M1618" with "R !! (snd, snd)%rel y1 y2".

In environment A1 : Type A2 : Type B1 : Type B2 : Type x1 : A1 x2 : A2 y1 : B1 y2 : B2 R : A1 * B1 -> A2 * B2 -> Prop H : forall (x1 x2 y1 y2 : B2) (R : B2 * B2 -> B2 * B2 -> Prop), RExists (R (x1, y1) (x2, y2)) R !! original: apply rel_push_fst_rexists. apply direct_rexists. intros _. apply rel_union_rexists_r. apply rel_push_rintro. exists (fun x => fst (R (x, x))). exists (fun y => fst (R (y, y))). split. - apply prod_rdestruct. exists (fst (fst y2)). exists (snd (fst y2)). split. + apply rel_union_rexists_l. apply rel_inter_rexists. split. * apply direct_rexists. apply x1. * apply direct_rexists. apply y1. + apply prod_rdestruct. exists (fst y1). exists (snd y1). split. * apply rel_union_rexists_r. apply rel_union_subrel_rexists_l. apply x1. * apply rel_union_rexists_l. apply rel_inter_subrel_rexists_r. apply y2. - apply rel_push_rintro. apply flip_rexists. apply rel_push_ind.
